column7: 'examples']	Merge FATE-v1.8's update info Master	"Merge FATE-v1.8's update info MasterSigned-off-by: mgqa34 mgq3374541@163.com

column2: based on integrated Hetero GLM framework
column3: with mixed protocol of HE and SPDZ

column1: * Add SecureBoost-MO algorithm to speed up multi-class classification of Hetero & Homo SecureBoost
* Optimize Hetero SecureBoost Predict Transmission Data Size，reduce 75% bandwidth consumption if tree's max depth is small
* Optimized Quantile Binning gk-summary structure & split point query，20%+ faster
* Support weighted training in non-coordinated Hetero Logistic Regression & Linear Regression
* Merge Hetero FastSecureBoost into Hetero SecureBoost as a boosting strategy option
* Enable Eggroll option to make computing output ""IN_MEMORY"" by default
* Include examples data upload and mnist download
* Provide pipeline to dsl convert tools
* Fix bug for SPDZ when using default q_filed
* Fix multiple get problem of SPDZ
* Fix bugs of recursive-query homo feature binning
* Fix bug for hetero feature selection when using federated filter but some party's feature is empty.

column1: 1 Optimize performance of Pearson which increases efficiency by more than twice.
2 Optimize Min-test module: Add secure-boost as optional test task. Set partyid and work_mode as input parameters. Use pre-import data set as input so that improved test process.
3 Support tok_k iv filter in feature selection module.
4 Support filling missing value for tag:value format data in DataIO.
5 Fix bug of lacking one layer of depth of tree in HeteroSecureBoost and support automatically alignment header of input data in predict process
6 Standardize the naming of example data set and add a data pre-import script.
1 Distinguish between user stop job and system stop job;
4 The model supports persistent storage to mysql
5 Push the model to the online service to support the specified storage address (local file and FATEFlowServer interface)"	1	True	2020-07-16 02:52:19	2020-07-16 12:12:08	2020-07-16 12:12:08

There is a commit that format markdown to reStructuredText
column3: so I'm trying to fix it.

column1: Support AIC/BIC-based Stepwise for Linear Models
Interoperate with AI ecosystem: Add pytorch backend for Homo NN
Early stopping strategy for hetero algorithms.
Add consistency check to Predict function
Optimize validation strategy，3x speed up in-training validation

column2: store and restore with reliable distributed system(Redis is currently supported)

column1: Using MySQL instead of Redis to implement Job Queue
Support for uploading client local files
Automatically detects the existence of the table and provides the destroy option

column4: scheduling command log can be independently audited

column1: New resource management components introduce the brand new session mechanism. Processors can be cleaned up with a simple method call
Removes storage service. No C++ / native library compilation is needed.
Federated learning algorithms can still work at a 28% packet loss rate.
Performances of federated learning algorithms are improved on Eggroll 2. Some algorithms get 10x performance boost.
Join interface is 16x faster than pyspark under federated learning scenarios.
Light dependencies. Check our requirements.txt / pom.xml and see.
Easy debugging. Necessary running contexts are provided. Runtime status are kept in log files and databases.
Few daemon processes. And they are all JVM applications."	1	True	2020-05-11 11:42:44	2021-12-17 05:41:45	2020-05-12 11:50:35
